forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. South wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is a study in clarity this afternoon. A gentle sun casts a warm light, though shadows lengthen as fall gives way to winter. The high temperatures hover around a modest sixty degrees, with a westward breeze adding just enough chill to remind us of the season. As the sun begins to retreat, the temperatures will dip slowly, settling into a cool evening. Tonight promises a mostly clear sky, with the promise of stars just beginning to twinkle as the urban landscape quiets down.

While the city enjoys a clear vista with no fog to mar the horizon, those venturing out would be wise to layer comfortably. A light jacket paired with a cozy scarf may suffice against the cool evening air, especially if one finds themselves lingering outdoors. For the discerning urbanite, this is an ideal time to take a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, perhaps stopping to sip a warm drink as the lights of the city come alive against the dimming sky. Alternatively, an exhibition or gallery visit could provide a lovely afternoon diversion that transitions seamlessly into a night of culture under the stars, perfect for unwinding in the city's enchanting embrace.
